item.title: Starting
item.author: Author
item.description: Starting Yes, sadrach is my real name. This is a personal space, not all the things I will share here are for teaching purposes, rather they are a reminder of how I am doing things and documenting the process. So many times I will simply throw out comments, thoughts or analysis that probably only I will find that probably only I will find interesting. But if you find it useful and/or share it, it’s fine, otherwise I’m not really interested, I don’t have time to go around arguing about personal thoughts.
